title: Best Curry in Bow
review: Hands down the best curry house in Bow. I order here once a week and it's always delicious and to a very high standard.
name: @seluwy

title: Great Indian food
review: Three of us loved the quality & quantity. I've eaten Indian food all over the world and have not enjoyed it as much as this.
name: KevGSmith

title: Amazing!!
review: You must order from this place. The saag aloo is the best I've ever had, and the chicken chat purée is just how it should be. Top class A+.
name: We8spurs

review: Really great food at very reasonable prices. Bring your appetite with you - the portions are huge! Any of the biryanis are amazing. Highly recommend.
name: Nancy Navin

review: Best Indian food in Dalston. The onion bhajis and peshwari naan are my go-to with any of their delicious curries.
name: Tamar van der Hoek

review: Everything I ever order from here is amazing. Each curry has its own individual taste. Order direct from their website - it's much cheaper than Deliveroo.
name: Alex Wernick

review: Best Indian we have found in London! They even left us a lovely birthday note in our delivery ☺️ 10/10 would recommend Ranna Dalston - worth the money!
name: Louise Friel

review: Have ordered delivery from Ranna many times over the months - the food is fantastic. Highly recommended!
name: Chris Dunn

review: Being able to have Quorn with any of the curries is great - they've done something magic with it. We've found our new regular curry house!
name: Richard John

review: Food is soooo good. The best curry I've had in so long, speedy delivery too. A good treat!
name: Zoe Davies

review: Delicious curry, highly recommend the Butter Paneer and Sylheti Chicken. Large portions and great value - we'll definitely be ordering again!
name: Rachel

review: I've settled on Ranna as my favourite after living in N16 for many years. Amazing food, particularly the paneer tikka and chicken karai - but it's all excellent.
name: Catherine Spence

review: Been living in London for a year now and hadn't found a curry place I liked - until now. OMG. The portion sizes are great too.
name: Luci D
